name: Color Escape (jamesellicott)
description:
Use the colors to your advantage and find you way to the exit.

This is a prototype for the new game that I am working on. The base  idea of the game is to use the colors around you to escape the area. I have had fun testing this personally and am excited for any feedback that anyone might have.

Future:

- Implementing an enemy AI that will patrol the map to try and catch the player and send them back to the start.

- Implementing new puzzles that will rack the brain.

- Creating more larger and complex levels that will hopefully be more challenging.

- Lots more polishhing.

- Let me know what you would like to see in the future.
